author: ahmedalbalaghi
content: how many dapps have been active/testing/being a part of the 7702 spec and discussions?

author: lightclient
content: 7702 isn't really a change that dapps need to engage with. we've had a fair number of wallets active during the spec discussions

author: frangio_
content:
there is an old note about 7702 enabling universal cross chain deployments that is no longer valid. i've opened a PR to remove it

however, without any solution for cross chain deployments, it feels like chain-agnostic 7702 signatures (chainId = 0) are not really able to fulfil their purpose? i'd love to hear people's thoughts on this...

https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8909

author: lightclient
content: i feel like chain agnostic sigs are still useful for deploying a smart contract wallet everywhere? even on chains that don't yet exist

author: frangio_
content: there is no strong guarantee that the code pointer will be valid on new chains afaik

author: frangio_
content: there is a potential change to 7702 that would make it good for cross chain deployments that was proposed at one point. i just added it to the PR description as an alternative. not sure if there are any significant issues with it
